mouse was bloated with lots of gas built up in digestive tract, mouse was also acting less active and hunched over, there were 4 masses around the front and sides of the neck which were harvested for histology, freezing, and cell line - possibly lymph nodes given their symetry, brain has a little nub in the front of it that looked larger than normal
